mapper.select: SELECT A.WRTN_DT , A.RSLN_BDCD , A.CNST_NO , A.STTM_DETL_SN , A.DBIT_CRIT_DCD , A.RPTS_ACTS_CD , A.ACTS_CD , A.KRW_AMT , A.FRCR_AMT , A.BDG_EXCU_BDCD , A.BDG_ACTS_CD , A.RVRS_BDCD , A.RSLN_SYNS_CTNS , A.FNDS_ISTR_JOB_CLSF_CD , A.ACCT_BCNC_CD , A.PRUF_KND_DCD , A.PRUF_DT , A.NTS_APVL_NO , A.ELC_PRUF_YN , A.VHCL_RGST_CD , A.NS_FNS_CD , A.PRDT_CD , A.PROJ_ID , A.CRRY_CD , A.EXRT , A.HND_DETL_DTM , A.HND_EMPNO , A.HND_TMNL_NO , A.HND_TR_ID , A.GUID FROM IBIMS432B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS431B B ON A.CNST_NO = B.CNST_NO AND A.RSLN_BDCD = B.RSLN_BDCD AND A.WRTN_DT = B.WRTN_DT WHERE 1=1 AND A.WRTN_DT = #{wrtnDt} AND A.RSLN_BDCD = #{rslnBdcd} AND A.ACTS_CD = #{actsCd} AND B.BCNC_NM = #{bcncNm}
